About Me

Hello! I'm a passionate Computer Science student with a strong interest in software development and technology. I'm currently pursuing my degree at Kennesaw State University and actively seeking internship opportunities to apply and expand my skills in a professional environment.

My technical journey began with learning Java and has evolved to include proficiency in various programming languages. I have been learning varios languages like C++, C, and Java. I also daily drive Arch Linux on Hyprland as well as Fedora Linux. I enjoy solving complex problems and building applications that make a difference.
